General.Name: Quantum Blockchain Technologies Plc
General.Description: Quantum Blockchain Technologies Plc, formerly known as Clear Leisure plc, is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in investments in mid venture, early stage, turnaround, mid venture, late venture and considers pre-IPO opportunities as well. It seeks to invest in blockchain, cryptocurrencies, quantum technology, artificial intelligence, leisure, real estate, interactive media, financial services, renewable & alternative energy sector and technology related investments especially interactive media sectors, consumer discretionary, information technology, communication services, utilities, real estate. It also prefers to invest in the entertainment sector with specific focus on theme park sector. The firm does not have any geographical restrictions. However, it seeks to invest in companies based in Asia/Pacific, Europe, China, Africa/Middle East, United Kingdom, Italy, and India. The focus of management is to pursue the monetization of all of the Company's existing assets, through selected realizations, court-led recoveries of misappropriated assets and substantial debt-recovery processes. The firm seeks to invest between $0.1 million and $15 million in the portfolio companies. The firm prefers to take minority stake. It seeks board seat in its investee companies. It exits its investments through initial public offering or trade sale. Quantum Blockchain Technologies Plc was founded in 1999 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
General.Address: 22 Great James Street, London, United Kingdom, WC1N 3ES
